lead_paragraph: The agreement paves the way to resume a delayed $5 billion copper mine that is expected to underpin growth of the country and the miner.

headline.main: Mongolia and Rio Tinto in Deal to Build Copper Mine
headline.print_headline: Mongolia and Rio Tinto Resolve Differences Over Copper Mine

snippet: The agreement paves the way to resume a delayed $5 billion copper mine that is expected to underpin growth of the country and the miner.
